thread.title: Comment on “Let’s Ball” A Look at the 2015 Kentucky Wildcats by Parvenu
thread.title_full: Comment on “Let’s Ball” A Look at the 2015 Kentucky Wildcats by Parvenu

author: Parvenu
title: Comment on “Let’s Ball” A Look at the 2015 Kentucky Wildcats by Parvenu
text:
Posted in Basketball , Main | 3 Responses 
Kentucky Wildcats TV has produced a behind-the-scenes documentary on last year’s historic team. Before Big Blue Madness on October 13, the documentary will be released on iTunes and available on Netflix. 
Kentucky Wildcats TV does a great job on all of their shorts, and by the looks of the trailer, this documentary will not disappoint. Article written by Nick Roush "Look upon the doughnut, and not upon the hole." @RoushKSR 3 responses to ““Let’s Ball” A Look at the 2015 Kentucky Wildcats” Dan October 1, 2015 at 10:00 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Yea I’m sure it won’t disappoint…until the Wisconsin game… Realme October 1, 2015 at 11:20 pm | Permalink | Reply 
No. October 2, 2015 at 4:27 am | Permalink | Reply 
Gosh, what a brilliant comment. If not protected by copyright, would like to use it. Post Comment - New and Improved (not really, it just works now)
